奏.definition: to play music; to achieve; to present a memorial to the emperor (old)

奏帖.definition: memorial to the emperor (folded in accordion form)

奏摺.definition: memorial to the emperor (folded in accordion form)

奏效.definition: to show results; to be effective

奏樂.definition: to perform music; to play a tune

奏鳴曲式.definition: sonata form (one of the large-scale structures used in Western classical music)
